feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
